title:
Continuity up to the boundary for minimizers of the one-phase Bernoulli
  problem
abstract:
We prove new boundary regularity results for minimizers to the one-phase
Alt-Caffarelli functional (also known as Bernoulli free boundary problem) in
the case of continuous and H\"older-continuous boundary data. As an
application, we use them to extend recent generic uniqueness and regularity
results to families of continuous functions.
